t: Aunt May's Bajan Pepper Sauce 340 g : Amazon.co.uk: Grocery
Aunt May's Hot Bajan Pepper Sauce 340g (Pack of 2) : Amazon.co.uk: Grocery
s: Aunt May's Bajan sauce is one of the best Carribbean sauces available! The heat level is medium low, so it can be used on many things or as a dipping sauce. Flavour is mustard and pepperynalmost picalilly and after the initial heat it doesn't build and get hotter.
